features: Fits in most airline overhead compartments and underneath airplane seat
Slip pockets & zippered clear pocket interior
body.description: Carry all your essentials in style and comfort with the Rockland wheeled under seat carry-on bag. Quilted polyester fabric exterior features a large main compartment for clothes, shoes and also has 2 slip pockets and two zippered pockets for keeping small essentials handy and organized. Retractable handle stores away while hand held handles allow for quickly grabbing bag from overhead bin or underneath seat. Back side has a strap allowing you to attach it to your wheeled carry on piece. This makes the perfect bag for overnight trips and the small size fits under near most airline seats allowing you to carry on your bag even when overhead bins are full.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BF31: Rockland Melrose Upright Wheeled Underseater Carry-On Luggage Carry all your essentials in style and comfort with the Rockland wheeled underseat carry on bag. Quilted polyester fabric exterior features a large main compartment for clothes and shoes, two slip pockets, and two zippered pockets for keeping small essentials organized. Retractable handle stores away. Hand held handles allows you to grab your bag quickly from the overhead bin or from under the seat. The small size fits under most airline seats, allowing you to carry on your bag even when overhead bins are full. Back side has a strap allowing you to attach it to your wheeled carry on piece. This is the perfect bag for overnight trips. 14"x8"x16" (with wheels)

Features and Design Telescoping Handle The telescoping handle stows away conveniently and allows for easy maneuvering when extended. Abundant Organization The interior features a large main compartment for clothes and shoes, two slip pockets, and two zippered pockets for keeping small essentials organized. Sturdy Inline Wheels Two sturdy inline wheels allow for easy transport of your belongings.

About Rockland Luggage Since its inception in 1998, Rockland by Fox Luggage has been proudly producing quality luggage and bags for the style savvy traveler. Recognized for its graphic and colorful designs, Rockland prides itself on creating products influenced by current trends in design and fashion. Our products turn heads in a crowd and stand out in the baggage carousel, making it easy for quick exits out the airport. Affordable and travel resistant, Rockland bags are an ideal companion for everything from quick trips to the gym to overnight getaways to extended vacations. Our selection includes: luggage sets (4 piece, 3 piece or 2 piece), hard cases, soft cases, carry ons, rolling backpacks, travel duffels, rolling duffels, cosmetic bags, and kids' backpacks. Over the years, a few Rockland products have been featured in film and television. Their colorful designs make them ideal for an eye catching visual element on screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great carry on bag
reviews.reviewText: The size, wheel function, weight, compartments, looks are all great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bag is perfect! I purchased it as a carry on bag for an upcoming plane trip. The bag has many spacious compartments for everything I need for a three-day trip. It rolls well, and it can be carried as well. I highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The right size.
reviews.reviewText: This is a compact bag that has enough room for a few days. It is super cute. I would not want to check this bag as it's not overly sturdy to be thrown around. It worked great for me. It says it will fit infer the airline seats but that may depend on the airline and if you are an isle seat as that storage seems to be smaller on some airlines. It was light weight and fit easily into the above storage area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So great but...
reviews.reviewText: I wish there was a 4.9 rating. Light, good looking, holds a lot for the size, I can fill it and still get it into the overhead bin (67 years old). Great price when I bought it. AND why did they put a little zipper over the pull handle. Sure it looks better but mostly I'll just have it flapping around as I need to put the handle up and down a lot. And if they were going to do that, why not purple fabric in there instead of gray. So I'm going to modify it by hand sewing the flap closed under the handle. I shouldn't have to do that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really liked being able to wheel this thru the airport and fitting it under the seat. Unfortunately one of the front zippers broke first time I used it. The company immediately sent me a replacement case once they were informed. Thankfully I used it within 30 days after buying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Liked it, but won't buy again
reviews.reviewText: I've had this bag for a year and did 27 flights. It's too wide to fit under the aisle seat, but does fit under middle and window seat. The handle started to rip from the bag after a year. The outer zipper pockets are a tight fit when full. Would be nice to have a laptop sleeve or the clothing straps inside. The clear zipper pouch inside and the 2 inner pockets for shoes were very handy. It did the job, but will look for better features with the next one. The wheels and extending handle held up great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a trip with multiple flights. I had two flights going and two returning home. The flights going were on a medium and large plane. I was in the middle and this worked perfectly fitting under the seat in front of me. Returning I was on an aisle seat in a large plane and on a small plane. It did not fit under the seat in front of me on either one. Just be aware it won’t fit under seats on all the planes.The bag itself worked well, easy to pack, loved the ability to pull vs carry. Held what I needed it to hold and held up well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get bag for traveling
reviews.reviewText: Nice bag for traveling .. Easy to handle. Nice size for the free travel on . Glad I purchased it
El tamaño es bueno para viajes rápidos y el color muy bonito.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A really useful bag, sturdy and not too big.

I bought this product so I could stick it under the seat of the plane and have access to my items without having to pull the whole bag out. I love this bag it is exactly what I was looking for has many compartments. Would definitely recommend it . Great product.

fast delivery and great customer service. Room inside was larger than I thought. It really held alot of luggage. 2 main zipped compartments and a front document/magazine compartment. Separate little pockets inside and a plastic velcro closing pocket for wet/dirty laundry. I also loved the 2 mesh pockets on either side. I just came back from 3 weeks in the USA and it was so easy with this as carry on luggage. It will fit under the seat, but u need to put your feet on it as it does take up all the room on the floor. The extendable handle was strong and easy to maneuver and folds down away out of sight when not in use and can be carried by the handles. Wheels were sturdy. This bag went through 7 flights I carried 5 outfit changes, shoes, meds, 3 magazines, 2 puzzle books, travel documents, snacks, water (in the side mesh pocket) and still had room for more. This bag still looks as good as new after coming home and unpacking. Highly recommend this travel bag.
